copyHeadingSymbol.title: Symbols for converting headings to plain text
copyHeadingSymbol.description: Enter multiple symbols, different symbols will be used according to heading level</br> For example:</br> emojiÔºö‚ù§Ô∏è‚≠êÔ∏èüí°</br> First symbol for h1, second for h2, and so on

inlineLatex.title: Convert to Inline Math
inlineLatex.description: When enabled, all math formulas (both LaTeX and Markdown) will be converted to inline format
